meanings.definition: A person who visits a place for pleasure or out of curiosity.
meanings.sent1: The visitors enjoyed exploring the museum.
meanings.sent2: Many visitors come to the park on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The visitors were so curious, they ended up getting lost in the maze!
meanings.sent4: The town welcomed the visitors with open arms.
meanings.sent5: The visitors' laughter filled the air as they wandered around the zoo.

meanings.definition: A person who visits a website or reads a blog.
meanings.sent1: The website had thousands of daily visitors.
meanings.sent2: Bloggers aim to attract more visitors to their sites.
meanings.sent3: The visitors to the blog left funny comments that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The website's visitors were like a virtual community.
meanings.sent5: The blog's visitors clicked on every interesting link they found.
